item.title: How to Create and Use Custom Icon Sets in Flutter
item.description: Flutter comes with a big library of built-in icons that you can use on your projects. In most projects, these icons should be enough, however, if you need to use custom icons, you will need to create your own icon font. Hereâ€™s a quick guide on how to create an icon font for your Flutter app: You would need to create SVG vectors for your icon images. You can use Adobe Illustrator or Sketch to create vector files.
